article:
Hello, I am Jack. I'm the leader of a sport team. The team _ are my father , my mother , my brother _ my sister .
My father is a famous _ player in our city. He has a lot of fans. He plays in the national  team and he will _ in the World Cup.
My mother has a _ habit . She gets up early in the morning. She jogs  in a park. She also _ doing yoga   in the evening. She is a happy mum. We love her very much.
My brother likes table tennis. _ plays it with his friends on Saturday or Sunday afternoon.
My sister _ to school every morning to keep fit. She is a dancer. Running helps her dance well.
Like my _ , I love football, too. I am _ the Football Club of my school.
I love my family--such a sport family.
